name: time_range_half_open
description: Validates that time ranges follow half-open interval convention as per ADR

conditions.message: Time ranges MUST use half-open intervals [start, end) where start is inclusive and end is exclusive
Time range parameters MUST be named with 'from' (inclusive) and 'to' (exclusive)
Time range parameters MUST NOT be named 'start' and 'end'
Time range parameters MUST NOT be named 'begin' and 'end'
Time range parameters MUST NOT be named 'startTime' and 'endTime'
Time range parameters MUST NOT be named 'beginTime' and 'endTime'
